attributes.action: bring pressure to bear upon the BBC to replace Neighbours, (moving to Channel 5), with Shortland Street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Shortland Street is a wonderful New Zealand soap which was axed by ITV in favour of supposedly high quality homegrown programming, namely Crossroads,(I jest not).  Crossroad was dire and didn't last but Shortland Street has not returned.  Now with Neighbours oving to Channel 5 the BBC has a golden opportunity to replace a tired old soap with something to really cheer the cockles of the great British viewing public.  BRING BACK SHORTLAND STREET!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
